channel.title: News in Brief – Joke Feed
channel.description: Real short-form news stories for joke writing. Curated and updated regularly.

item.title: Orlando, FL — Deputies rescue emu near city pond
item.description: An emu escaped in Orlando and was found near a pond. Deputies corralled it safely. The Sheriff’s Office joked: 'Cat in a tree? Nope…'

item.title: Fargo, ND — Ground squirrels overrun public spaces
item.description: Fargo officials report a surge of ground squirrels invading city parks and sidewalks, prompting rodent control efforts.

item.title: Australia — Snake found aboard commercial flight
item.description: A commercial flight was delayed in Australia after a snake was spotted roaming in the cabin. Crew secured the reptile mid-flight.
